author: pasenov
body: I have added trackGenJetAK4 to jetMC_cff.py. It is used to produce a list of genJets that are made with charged particles only (fulfilling some criteria). The only changes made are in PhysicsTools/NanoAOD/python/nanogen_cff.py and PhysicsTools/NanoAOD/python/jetMC_cff.py.
title: trackGenJetAK4 added
